data.title: Charles Dickens: Biography
data.meta_description: Charles Dickens - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides a biography of Charles Dickens, the prolific 19th century British author. It discusses that he was born in 1812 in England and had a difficult childhood, being forced to work in a factory for a period of time. As an adult, he had a very successful career as a novelist and wrote many beloved classics such as Oliver Twist, A Christmas Carol, and Great Expectations. The biography provides details on his personal life and family as well as his career as a journalist, editor, and illustrator. It also discusses some of his most famous novels and how they were published, as well as adaptations of his works into films.
